#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int v[2][1000000]={{0,0}};
main()
{int t,k=1,m,n,s,p,q,pv=1,pr=1,i,count=0;
cin>>t;
	while(k<=t)
	{pv=1;pr=1;count=0;
	cin>>n>>m>>s>>p>>q;
		for(i=0;i<s;i++)
		{
			v[0][i]=pv+p;
			while(v[0][i]>n)
			{
				v[0][i]=v[0][i]-n+m-1;
			}
			pv=v[0][i];
		}
			for(i=0;i<s;i++)
		{
			v[1][i]=pr+q;
			while(v[1][i]>n)
			{
				v[1][i]=v[1][i]-n+m-1;
			}
			pr=v[1][i];
		}
		for(i=0;i<s;i++)
		{
		//cout<<v[0][i]<<"  "<<v[1][i]<<endl;
		
		if(v[0][i]==v[1][i])
		count++;
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
		k++;
		for(i=0;i<1000000;i++)
		{//cout<<v[0][i]<<"  "<<v[1][i]<<endl;
		v[0][i]=0;v[1][i]=0;}
	}
}
